summary: Project renamed to SUTRA; logo requested.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- SUTRA logo on white background, matching the uploaded reference mark with circular swoosh and upward arrow; no extra text (sutra-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Square favicon derived from the same SUTRA logo, centered with padding on transparent or white background (sutra-favicon.dim_32x32.png)

existing_features.title: Rename all user-facing application naming from “Habitual” to “SUTRA”, including the browser tab title and the main header/welcome text in the UI.
Create a new SUTRA logo image asset matching the uploaded reference logo (image.png) and use it in the app header in place of the current green gradient square + checkmark icon logo.
Add a favicon derived from the SUTRA logo and update `frontend/index.html` to reference it so browser tabs show the SUTRA icon.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create/design a logo for SUTRA (details TBD)
